name: ODSession
desc: An ODSession object serves as a Cocoa wrapper for an Open Directory session.

items.name: class func `default`() -> ODSession!
items.desc: Returns a shared instance of the local session.

items.name: init(options: [AnyHashable : Any]!)
items.desc: Creates a session object directed over proxy to another host.

items.name: func nodeNames() -> [Any]
items.desc: Returns the node names that are registered with this session.
